mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.app_id AS "appId", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.material_no AS "materialNo"
LEFT JOIN ta_tender_author b ON b.id = a.app_id inner join sm_mat_info m on a.material_no = m.material_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_tender_author_dtl( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, app_id, line_no, material_no ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{appId}, #{lineNo}, #{materialNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ta_tender_author_dtl SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, app_id = #{appId}, line_no = #{lineNo}, material_no = #{materialNo} WHERE id = #{id}
